paragraphs.name: 02eb
paragraphs.text: New York State has 17 Insurers on ACA, so why does Oklahoma have 1?

paragraphs.name: 42ad
paragraphs.text: This brings back old memories. Like when we had the massive tea party rallies against Obamacare…. the worse healthcare plan in history. I guess now the Dems will do the same thing….. and all we are trying to do is fix the mess they created

paragraphs.name: 32b7
paragraphs.text: Sad, really. The hatred and mockery that the left love so much is what got them here. Now, they hate Trump because he beat them at their own game. And you can bet the farm that the outgoing administration did its best to hurt the next one. I’d guess that happens a lot. But the violence of the progressives is alarming. Refusing to accept the results…

virtuals.subtitle: Republican politicians have historically done a better job of outreach to their constituents, bypassing DC lobbyists and big labor bosses…

d4e20772fe03.title: It’s been well documented by now that professional agitators are being shipped in to disrupt town…

content.subtitle: Republican politicians have historically done a better job of outreach to their constituents, bypassing DC lobbyists and big labor bosses…

paragraphs.name: dc6a
paragraphs.text: It’s been well documented by now that professional agitators are being shipped in to disrupt town hall meetings, especially those Republicans who are seen as vulnerable in the next election cycle. It is dishonest to describe these people as “constituents” but I suspect any writer representing an organization called “ThinkProgress” is motivated by…

paragraphs.name: fda9
paragraphs.text: I don’t understand people. They have complained about Obamacare since it started. Now that someone wants to do something better, hopefully, all they want to do is gripe. I guess it is because Pres. Trump is at the head of the table if it was a Dem. that would be. Hillary’s people need to get over it, let Pres. Trump have his time to “make America great again”. If he can’t, vote him out next time.

paragraphs.name: 4b31
paragraphs.text: Republicans in general appear to be consumingly selfish, greedy and generally soulless. One major observation includes:

paragraphs.name: 6a2a
paragraphs.text: 1-A feeling of ENTITLEMENT, meaning that they think the US Treasury belongs to them, and that the people do not deserve health care, or child welfare, or other assistance — THE 1% DESERVE THE US TREASURY…
